author: jleroux
msg: "Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1661977  "
The real reason of the recent issue while loading demo data was due to r1661612, reverts it here and will reopen OFBIZ-5027

require-new-transaction="true"
when calling createProductFacility service, not sure why it was needed

author: markt
msg: Fix ordering problem exposed now OpenSSL supports cipher suites with ephemeral ECDH with something other than AES

author: markt
msg: Add OpenSSL constant names to aid adding new Cipher suites

author: brane
msg: On the svn-info-detail branch: Modify output of 'svn info --show-detail'
when showing information about multiple targets.
* BRANCH-README: Update branch status and output example.
* subversion/svn/info-cmd.c
(kind_str): New; converts node-kind to a string for print_info_item().
(print_info_baton_t): Removed field 'print_newline'.
Added fields 'multiple_targets', 'target_is_path' and 'start_new_line'.
(print_info_item): Adjust output for multiple targets.
(svn_cl__info): Initialize the new fields in print_info_baton_t.
Print the final newline of 'svn info --show-item' output.
